sentences.en: It is about the size of a grain of rice and is called the stirrup.
sentences.cn: 它的大小大约是一粒米，被称为马镫。

sentences.en: Charlemagne had the stirrup. We have the computer.
sentences.cn: 查理曼拥有马镫，我们拥有电脑。

sentences.en: The first-order effects of the stirrup were dramatic.
sentences.cn: 马镫的一阶效应已是非常巨大。
